getNativeInterpreter

public java.lang.Object getNativeInterpreter()
Returns the native interpreter, or null if it is not initialized or destroyed. From application's standpoint, it never returns null, and the returned object must be an instance of groovy.lang.GroovyShell @since 3.0.2 *
